p: As previously discussed, no effective drug treatment is available for fighting this COVID-19. But several drugs including anti-viral, anti-malarial, anti-microbial and several anti-bacterial drugs have been available and using in the treatment against COVID-19. Mostly combination of drugs serves as an effective treatment against COVID-19. Systemic corticosteroids (Hydrocortisone, methyl prednisolone, dexamethasone, and prednisolone) are not recommended in the treatment of viral pneumonia or ARDS due to the increased mortality and secondary infection rates in influenza, impaired clearance of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV, and complications of corticosteroid therapy in survivors [ 39].
